posts.post_content:
Let's face it.  
  
[Mind Twist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Twist) with ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) for random discard was undercosted. [Mind Shatter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Shatter) with ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) for random discard seems to be right.  
  
This is selected discard so, ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) or ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) is undercosted. Do we want people to be able to splash this? If not then ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) is out and this should cost ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) or ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol). So this is not horribly overcosted.
posts.html:
Let's face it.

Mind Twist with for random discard was undercosted. Mind Shatter with for random discard seems to be right.

This is selected discard so, or is undercosted. Do we want people to be able to splash this? If not then is out and this should cost or . So this is not horribly overcosted.

posts.post_content:
Possibly the worst discard spell of all time, considering with Twist and Shatter you will be emptying their hand fully most of the time.  
Choosing cards is not worth extra mana. Consider [Wit's End](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wit's End), [Duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Duress), [Thoughtseize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thoughtseize), pretty much anything over this POS.
posts.html:
Possibly the worst discard spell of all time, considering with Twist and Shatter you will be emptying their hand fully most of the time.
Choosing cards is not worth extra mana. Consider Wit's End, Duress, Thoughtseize, pretty much anything over this POS.

posts.post_content: [Mind Twist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Twist) is most definitely better, but this card lets you force your opponent to discard *any* card, most discard spells target nonland cards or have some other restricting condition ([Inquisition of Kozilek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inquisition of Kozilek) for example) Still wayyy too expensive.
posts.html:
